meanings.sent1: The banana was the mushiest fruit in the bunch.
meanings.sent2: After the rain, the ground became the mushiest it had ever been.
meanings.sent3: The mushiest pillow in the house was always the most comfortable.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like the mushiest sponge, absorbing all the love around her.
meanings.sent5: The mushiest mud squished between his toes as he walked through the garden.

meanings.sent1: The movie was the mushiest love story she had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: She always gets mushiest during romantic comedies.
meanings.sent3: His mushiest moments were when he talked about his childhood teddy bear.
meanings.sent4: Her voice became the mushiest when she spoke about her family.
meanings.sent5: The mushiest songs always make her tear up with emotion.
